name: ToothbrushTimer
0:
”Alexa, start toothbrush timer”
”Ask toothbrush timer to start”
”I'm going to start brushing my teeth”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toothbrush timer
des: We provide a timing framework for the user's daily brushing activities by sounding a 'ding', every 15 seconds, and reminding the user of the time they spent (fruitlessly) brushing their teeth, every 30 seconds, for a total of 2 minutes. You can pause and resume the timer wherever you want
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
